p: The embryonic mortality rate was not significantly affected ( P > 0.05) by the doses of the essential oil used. However, it tends to decrease with essential oil whatever the dose compared to the control. The lowest embryonic mortality rate was recorded in quails treated with 100 μl/kg bw. The ginger essential oil whatever the dose induced a nonsignificant ( P > 0.05) increase in chick's weight compared to the control. However, the highest chick weight was recorded with 100 μl/kg bw of the essential oil ( Table 6).
